channel.title: (Delta) server editing!@#@!#
channel.description: How do i change the home place and where all my shops are addshops/delete shops Like where a new player just logged in (deltascape source) also i want to know how to make teleports like when i click lumbridge teleport tab it takes me to lumbridge lets say i wanted to make it say monsters and i click forma variety of monsters

item.title: (Delta) server editing!@#@!#
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

[quote=“911 u died, post:1, topic:367122”]How do i change the home place and where all my shops are addshops/delete shops
Like where a new player just logged in (deltascape source) also i want to know how to make teleports like when i click lumbridge teleport tab it takes me to lumbridge lets say i wanted to make it say monsters and i click forma variety of monsters[/quote]

To change Starting Home go to Player.Java and find:

// initial x and y coordinates of the player

You’ll find X and Y cords there.

To delete Shops, find Shops.Cfg/Autospawn.Cfg in source files

Read full topic

item.title: (Delta) server editing!@#@!#
item.dc:creator: @Keatrm Keatrm
item.description:
@Keatrm wrote:

It looks like your a newbe
Hey, I would recommend starting with something better then Delta.
Even if you get good at Delta you will find out how bad it is, and you will most likely switch to a better source like PI.

I say don’t waste your time with Delta, learn with better sources first

Read full topic

item.title: (Delta) server editing!@#@!#
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

To change home place - You go to Client.Java
Shops - Shops.Cfg/Autospawn.Cfg
New Player Home - Player.Java (Something player at least)

I forgot the last one.

Read full topic
